completed_steps.summary: Classified as monolith WordPress hybrid theme (web type)

Source tree documented with 50+ files mapped
Dev guide with install, config, content management, conventions documented
Architecture doc with system diagram, design system, data model, schema, asset pipeline
All supporting docs written: project-overview, component-inventory, development-guide
Master index generated with navigation and AI guidance
